Html:
A few things I've noticed.

rawr.ProtWar - Missing
1. ZG Helm Enchant
2. Glove Threat Enchant
3. Shield Enchants

rawr.Mage - Impossible, or did I miss something? ><
1. Optimizer is enchanting my offhand with Sunfire
ProtWar isn't released yet, it's still in development. I'm assuming you're building your own copy from the codebase? And yes, offhand enchants is a know bug, will be fixed in the next version.
I added the ZG helm enchant, threat enchant, and a few shield enchants. Like Astrylian said, weapon enchants and shield enchants are still buggy, and will be fixed soon.

OOh, I see the added enchants now. >.<

Thanks for all the hard work guys!
